title: $79+ O/W Fall, Winter Flights on 3-Day Sale
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $79+ O/W Fall, Winter Flights on 3-Day Sale $79+ O/W Fall, Winter Flights on 3-Day Sale October 13, 2015 8:59pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Now through Thursday, Alaska Airlines has discounted airfares to various parts of the U.S., including to cities in the last couple of unionized states: Anchorage, Honolulu, Las Vegas, and San Francisco. Flights start $79 one-way ($158 round-trip), and must be booked at least 21 days in advance and by 11:59 p.m. PT on October 15.

Now through Thursday, Alaska Airlines has discounted airfares to various parts of the U.S., including to cities in the last couple of unionized states: Anchorage, Honolulu, Las Vegas, and San Francisco. Flights start $79 one-way ($158 round-trip), and must be booked at least 21 days in advance and by 11:59 p.m. PT on October 15. 
Travel on most routes is valid Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Saturdays during November 3 - February 3. Hawaii travel is valid Mondays - Thursdays during November 3 - March 11. Sale fares are not available November 18 - December 3 and December 16 - January 7. See the sale provider for more travel restrictions. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros: Valid through as far off as March 2016. Cons: Mostly applicable for West Coast travelers. Verdict: Take advantage if the routes fit--but by Thursday. SEARCH FOR THIS DEAL!
